subject: New review (3★) of Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback (from Chris B.)
description_text: Rating: 3 | Review Text: Great when they work however I've been having issues with them either losing connection or even locking on mid race. Chris Belcher Display name: Chris B. Great when they work however I've been having issues with them either losing connection or even locking on mid race. I understand there is a fix related to grounding the control box however no wire is included so I haven't been able to do this.
